item.title: Hello World
item.description: Blowing the dust off the domain, trying Hugo out. tap tap Is this thing on?

item.title: home lab: consolidating multiple PSUs
item.description: A while back, I traded writing salt states and managing systemd .service files wrapping podman for the ‘simplicity’ of running kubernetes in my home lab. Jury is still out on weather or not the switch was worth it. The cluster is a hodgepodge of second hand Intel NUCs and other scavenged compute hardware i’ve collected over the past few years. Some of it runs on 12v, some of it on 19v.
